features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Subtitles?
features.description: Leverage our cutting-edge AI for subtitling, ensuring clarity and style with minimal effort.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Add subtitles in seconds, enhancing your videos without delays.

items.title: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: No editing experience needed. Upload your video and our AI handles the rest.

items.title: Secure and Private
items.description: All video processing occurs in your browser, ensuring your content remains confidential.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three straightforward steps to subtitle your videos flawlessly

items.title: Upload Video
items.description: Drag and drop your video file or input a URL. Our platform supports various formats.

items.title: AI Subtitling
items.description: Our AI analyzes dialogue and captions, automatically creating engaging subtitles that fit the style you choose.

items.title: Download Final Video
items.description: Preview your video with added subtitles and download it in high quality ready for sharing.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless creators who enhance their videos with WaveSpeed AI

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: Adding subtitles with WaveSpeed was a breeze! My viewers love the translations.

items.name: John Smith
items.comment: As a vlogger, this tool transformed my content. Subtitles make my videos accessible to everyone.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our subtitling feature

items.title: What languages can I add subtitles in?
items.description: WaveSpeed AI supports multiple languages, ensuring your content resonates with a global audience.

items.title: Is there a cost to using this feature?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 royalty-free subtitles daily. Additional options are available through subscription plans.

items.title: Can I customize the appearance of the subtitles?
items.description: Absolutely! You can choose font styles, colors, and positions to match your video's theme.

items.title: How does the privacy protection work?
items.description: WaveSpeed processes all videos locally on your device; no content is stored or uploaded, ensuring full privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and witness the difference. No sign-up necessary.
